name: Qin Jin
content: Qin Jin Qin Jin Professor School of Infomation Renmin University of China Bio. Qin Jin is a full professor at Renmin University of China. She directs the Multi-level Multi-aspect Multi-modal (AI.M3) Lab at School of Information. She received her Ph.D. degree in Language and Information Technologies from Carnegie Mellon University in 2007 and her B.Sc. and M.S. degrees in computer science and technologies from Tsinghua University, Beijing, China in 1996, 1999, respectively. Her research interests are in multimedia intelligent computing and human computer interaction. News
